document_data.name: Tern's Shipwright Service
document_data.mainbody: '''Tern's Shipwright Service''' was a business located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's destruction.
document_data.Location: Tern's Shipwright Service was located in south Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]] along [[Baron Street]] near the docks and waterfront.
document_data.Activities: The business constructed and repaired ships for customers.
